name.ja: バーニングナックル・クロスカウンター

text.en:
When your opponent activates a monster effect: Destroy 1 "Battlin' Boxer" or "Number" Xyz Monster you control, and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do that, destroy that monster, then you can apply this effect.
● Special Summon 1 "Battlin' Boxer" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck with a different name than your destroyed monster, and if you do, attach this card to it as material.
You can only activate 1 "Battlin' Boxing Cross Counter" per turn.
